## loadData

```{r include=FALSE}
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE)

library(MotifBinner2)

if (!exists('result'))
{
  result <- all_results[['loadData']]
}
if (class(result) != 'loadData')
{
  result <- all_results[['loadData']]
}
```

`r length(result$final)` files were sucussfully loaded.

The number of reads per file:
```{r}
tmp <- lapply(result$final, length)
kable(data.frame('data set' = names(tmp),
                 'n reads' = as.numeric(tmp),
                 check.names=F,
                 row.names=NULL))
```

```{r, results='asis'}
y <- result$timing
sliceTime <- function(x){
  z <- summary(x)['user']
  names(z) <- NULL
  z
}

cat(paste('\nTiming for the steps in ', class(result), '\n', sep = ''))
kable(data.frame(step = names(sapply(y, sliceTime)),
           time = sapply(y, sliceTime),
           row.names = NULL))
```
